nodes.text: The Daa Camp was an outpost established by Dylanto Daa and the Daa Corporation on Ontotho, situated on the border of Fylar. While assisting the Fylari, who claimed to have been attacked by the corporation, the Jedi Padawan Cere Junda infiltrated the camp. She discovered that her master, Eno Cordova, who she had thought to be dead, had been rescued by the Daa Corporation, and believed that they were in the right.
